Question: They had kept abreast of this person's developing ideas through their attendance at his Saturday evening lectures.
Hints: In 1865, the nine-year-old this person entered the Leopoldstädter Kommunal-Realgymnasium, a prominent high school.
This person turned to Brill and Jones to further his ambition to spread the psychoanalytic cause in the English-speaking world.
As a medical researcher, this person was an early user and proponent of cocaine as a stimulant as well as analgesic.
